extendedInfo.description: FISHPOINTSFishpoints is for Marine Navigation, indicates the direction and the place where you are, you can navigate with your favorite device.App for navigation at sea, lake and river, with instruments, accessories and information. App is dedicated to the sea and the people who love and live it with passion. NAVIGATIONFishpoints is GPS navigator for sea, rivers and lakes, ideal for boaters, fishermen and water sports.You can return on your favorite points of interest with the indicators of the direction, speed and distance from arrival, youâll always know where to go.Simplicity! GMap and touch screen makes it innovative and interactive, you can zoom with two fingers.When you Click on map, you can view  information and save a point to reach, Tracking of the route of your boat, you will receive information on maximum and average speed.WAYPOINTSFishpoints allows you to store your POIs for fishing.You can:	-Create	-Edit	-Delete	-ShareYou can see all the points shared by you, in a range of max 50 miles.TRACKINGFishpoints is able to monitoring the route, it can display information about maximum and average speed, calculate the travel time and view all points on map.You can edit the route to add new marks to navigate.You will display all your routes at any time.FEATURES   - Navigator GPS    - Interactive Map    - Active Pointer    - Create/Manage/Delete POI    - Share POI    - Tracking    - Route Information    - Share/Vote Image    - Moon Phase    - Meteo    - Morse Code    - Sea Flag    - Route    - Share ImageAPP VERSION	-Fishpoints (Iphone)	-Fishpoints HD (Ipad)	-Fishpoints Lite (Iphone)	-Fishpoints HD Lite (Beta, incoming)REQUIRED	-Active GPS	-3G connectionNEXT FUTUREGroup READ MORE: www.fishpoints.netBefore Buy try Fishpoints Lite, Do you like? Buy it!

reviews.comment: Launched ap and only got a pic of a squid. No cgarts no settings no help to figure it out.
reviews.author: Rodney Fite
